ComicInfo.Series: Locke & Key: Welcome to Lovecraft, Legacy Edition
ComicInfo.Title: Welcome To LoveCraft - Chapter One
ComicInfo.Summary: Welcome To LoveCraft - Chapter One: Al and Sam murder Rendell Locke. Tyler stuns Sam, and Sam ends up in Juvenile Detention. After the funeral, the Locke family moves to Lovecraft, Massachusetts -- into the family mansion, Keyhouse. While exploring the house, Bode finds a key. He uses the key to unlock a door. When he passes the threshold, his spirit leaves his body.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 09:55:22. [Issue ID 781064]
ComicInfo.Characters: Mrs. Locke,Bode Locke,Kinsey Locke,Tyler Locke,Sam Lesser,Al Grub,Rendell Locke,Duncan Locke
